text: Rithvik Dhanjani is an Indian television actor. He played Arjun Digvijay Kirloskar in Pavitra Rishta. He won the Indian dance reality show Nach Baliye 6 with his partner Asha Negi and also the host of Zee Rishtey Awards. In June 2012, Dhanjani entered Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa 5 as Wild Card entry and came in third place. ==Filmography== ===Television=== Year Title Role Notes Ref. 2010-11 Bandini Parth Shashank Mehta 2009–2010 Bairi Piya Prithvi Pundir 2010 Tere Liye Partho Rawal 2010–2011 Pyaar Kii Ye Ek Kahaani Jay Khurana 2011–2014 Pavitra Rishta Arjun Digvijay Kirloskar 2013–2015 Yeh Hai Aashiqui Kabir 2012 Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa 5 Contestant 2nd runner-up 2013 Sapne Suhane Ladakpan Ke Himself Guest Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa 6 India's Best Dramebaaz Host 2013–2014 Nach Baliye 6 Contestant Winner 2014 MTV Webbed 2 Himself Guest MTV Fanaah Vidhyut Dare 2 Dance Contestant India's Best Cinestars Ki Khoj Himself Guest Hum Hain Na India's Raw Star Host 2014–2015 Box Cricket League 1 Contestant 2015 Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi 6 Himself Guest Kumkum Bhagya Arjun Kirloskar India Poochega Sabse Shaana Kaun?
